Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Visited with some friends on my visit from London. They highly recommended this place and it's easy to see why. Such a relaxed atmosphere and lovely people. The dishes were brilliant. I had the 3 taster dishes which were typically Dutch and I loved them. Very generous portion sizes and an overall wonderful evening.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Amazing host, delicious food, great atmosphere. Recommended.ü§§üëçüèª

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Best dinner imaginable!  And a fun and lively atmosphere as well!  You cannot eat here and leave without a big smile on your face.  This was the perfect ending to our week in the Netherlands!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The food was really good with a homemade taste. The host was funny, very polite and the ambiance was great. Try the beer if you can, it's made in house . It was very good.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Friendly staff, nice Dutch food (we ordered the chickenschnitzel, clums, mushrooms and their special beer), everything tasted very good! Sexy decor on top of that, following the vibes of the city. The prices are normal, not cheap, not expensive.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Bistro with typical Dutch cuisine. The interior is not too attractive but few tables are available outside and it would be a good choice if the weather is fine. The only beer in the menu is crafted by the owners. Not bad but you can find much better in Amsterdam.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We had a great time and a delicious dinner here. The owner of the restaurant is a fun-loving woman who has a great personality and made the evening very enjoyable!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text:
Visted the bistro on my last day in Amsterdam with my mum.
Brilliant food and atmosphere. Very friendly staff, a real experience of Amsterdam. Highly recommanded!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We just wanted to stop for a quick snack but ended up waiting for quite a while. The food was good in general and the staff friendly. However with the kitchen being fully exposed to the dining area we smelled like fried chicken when we left.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: What a nice restaurant. We had a really good time with some delicious dutch food there. Very friendly ladys and good athmosphere

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: I give this place 4 stars for the cozy atmosphere, friendly service, and their own tasty seasonal brown beer they had on tap.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Want homemade delicious dutch food? Cozy atmosphere? Friendly staff? We had the "stamppot tastery", poutine-like samplings on mashed potatoes instead of French fries. Yummm!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Aside from the delicious food, shot out for the Amazing hosts, very funny, friendly and welcoming environment. Love it.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Favorite place that we ate in Amsterdam. Comfort food with a cheeky sense of humor. Loved the owner!!! Loved the poffertjes!!!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: This restaurant have a excellent menu of local food and a delicious beer

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: love this place have been here every time I have been to Amsterdam Yummy food and great beer ! You must try their Dutch croquettes the best in Amsterdam YUMMMMMY !!! see you next time !! The owner here is a very nice lady and gives good service !!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The best pancakes I've ever had! The apple pie was fab too. Loved the coziness of this place.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We stumbled upon this gem on our first night in Amsterdam, really having no idea what we wanted to eat aside from knowing we wanted some traditional/typical Dutch food. The food here was great, you can tell it was home made and was so ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The food was good, just good. The portions are big. Nice service.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: They serve sensational croquets. Their beer is also great

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We were looking for something down to earth and comfy, and came across this Dutch Bistro. As a dutchman myself I lived it. The Bistro has a lot of history and fun artifacts (go look inside!) and the owner has some great stories to tell. Service is good and friendly, food looked ok.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Great food. Should try the 3 stampojds. Steak is great too

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Really enjoyed it! I had the sausage with smashed potatoes and my boyfriend had a burguer with fries and salad. We had a beer together. Both dishes were great and it seemed like a "dutch experience" which was what we were looking for - ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We walked past this restaurant often, and finally decided to give it a try.  Glad we did!  Our party of four arrived for an early dinner around 6:30pm so there was no wait for tables. The service was attentive despite a single waitress ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Very nice foods, even this place a little bit small but the owner are amazing. Tante wants to please everybody, so she will try to accommodate everyone. She's very thoughtful and give us explanation for every food that we order. Warm and full of smiles!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Fantastic  food friendly  lovley people and exceptional  chocolate truffle

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Fantastic ambience- quirky and modern with historic touch . Staff are hilarious and make you feel like family.  Authentic Dutch food    Four of is had a variety of food and all was delicious. I had the 3 Dutch stoomp pots ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: I went there randomly with a friend. It looked cozy when we looked though the window. It indeed was. Very friendly waitresses and cosy Dutch vintage (kitsch) decor. The food is good, not exceptional. They don‚Äôt have too much beer choices ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The owner Carla was a lovely host. I had the Grandmother's stew, red cabbage, mash potatoes and apple sauce. When eaten a little at a time clockwise they really compliment each others taste (suggested by Carla). Service was great and the prices were very reasonable for Amsterdam. I think dinner and beers were <‚Ç¨20.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: If you think that the only reason to choose a restaurant is the "Kitchen", well, I think you have to go here. The restaurant is small, let me say, intimate and welcoming restaurant. Already from outside you will be impressed by the ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: This was a bit of a find. It does not necessarily look promising but once you meet the owner you'll be smitten - great personality and sense of humour. The food was very well prepared, the atmosphere friendly and buzzing. Four stars for all ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Perhaps the food is good here. I don‚Äôt know. We waited at least 25 minutes to have our order taken but no one ever bothered to come over to us. I guess we weren‚Äôt the trouble. And lest you think the restaurant was too busy, the waitresses ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Very cosy little restaurant with really friendly, welcoming staff. We had the stampot tasting board and it was really good but we were a bit disappointed with the lack of choice on the menu, all the dishes were quite similar. There were no ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The place is amazing. Food is like home cooked, atmosphere is really cozy. If your quest is "I want to eat something local" that's the place to go. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We stumbled across this gem of a restaurant whilst researching where Anne Franks house was. The food was excellent with a fair choice - I had a steak that was quite frankly probably one of the best I have ever had. The rest of the food was ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Very good delicious food. We really wanted to try some Dutch food and this was a great choice. Great and friendly service. smiling staff. highly recommended

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Absolutely cutest little bistro. The food was delicious and most definitely home made. The owners are incredibly kind and welcoming. I would recommend this little nook to anyone looking for a good meal in Amsterdam.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: I don't like leaving negative reviews, however this seems more like a quick tourist place. Staff are not particularly friendly or welcoming and the croquettes typical Dutch snack were not very good and I wasn't given cutlery either. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Excellent service and food, cosy atmosphere.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Pathetic restaurant. We made a booking through google for 12:30. We planned the rest of our day around our lunch as its difficult to find a recommended restaurant without booking. They were not open at the time booked and they mentioned ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: A lovely restaurant with authentic Dutch food (to me at least), and it was all delicious! The service is friendly, and the food came out fast. The decor is cozy and comfortable, making us feel as if we were eating in someone's home. A worthy stop while in Amsterdam.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: 1. Horrible food. Reading reviews, i expected to have an amazing lunch. The food was dry, not tasty, this place is not worth the money I spent for the lunch at all :/ ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Went to this restaurant because I wanted to experience a simple Dutch meal. Absolutely not disappointed. Hearty, warm stamppot with a big meatball certainly cured this weary traveler's soul. However I was a lil jealous I wasn't given a ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text:
Don't eat here!!
We arrived at the restaurant and we greeted with a friendly face but that was the last good thing about this place. It took 30 minutes for them to come and take ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: This place was so horrible.  Expensive for small amount of food and rude staff.  Didn't want to buy their water, wouldn't give us tap water, then yelled at us when we tried to drink our own bottled water out of our bag.  Said, "it doesn't ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Delicious Stamppot, but I really came here for the house made liqueurs. There are many different varieties (at least a dozen!) so you're bound to find something you like. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We will be forever grateful to bistro bij for literally finding a place at the inn on Christmas Eve for this family!  It was our good fortune to stumble on this place after visiting the Anne Frank Museum.  The proprietress found us a spot ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We randomly walked into this place and I'm so glad we did! I had the chicken satay it was so amazing! Very cute decorations good service! Great all around!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: My husband and I spent our second honeymoon evening here.  We had such a lovely and personal experience.  The food was excellent and our service was also spectacular.  If you are looking for a nice evening with a staff that will give you wonderful suggestions, this is your place.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: A nice restaurant close to Westerkerk and Anne Frank House. We liked the local atmosphere and the outdoor area on the canal (Prinsengraght) bank, the service was good as well. I ordered Granny's casserole and my wife got chicken schnitzel. Food was tasty but potions were less than expected. The price was average for Amsterdam.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The food was really good and the owner of the place was so welcoming and pleasant to he around. The portion size are just right and the takes it's just on point.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: A clean place (4/5) with an atypical atmosphere (4/5) with a good and fast service (5/5) but with no interest regarding the food we ate (2/5). The burger and a club sandwich (nothing local) were uninteresting and were not enough to recommend this place.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The waitress was friendly at first (when it was relatively quiet), but then all the staff started getting overwhelmed and started rushing around as there were more customers which in turn killed the cozy atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Delicious Dutch food and a jolly restaurant owner/staff who makes your experience enjoyable by helping you choose right and also explaining to you what you eat. Great place for foreigners to try Dutch cuisine!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: My mother and I visited twice in a visit to the city that was less than 48 hours long, for dinner and lunch. The first time we stumbled upon it while starving and a little lost. It was SUCH a nice experience, we went out of the way to visit ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The shop owner is so kind and sweet. I start my day here with Champignons Omelette and orange juice. Enjoy the beautiful canal with various boat tour passing by. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Tourist trap! Avoid that place! Execrable and patronizing service, ordinary food, stinky place, questionable cleanliness, loud music. Very expensive for what you get. At this price you will find much better in the neighborhood.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Absolutely the best food I think I‚Äôve ever had

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Great and tasteful! And Carla is wonderful!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The baby pancakes were excellent!  Great friendly owners.   Quirky decor is worth the visit.  The other food looked great also.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Very interesting deco and friendly staff. The food is mediocre, but I suppose dutch cuisine is not refined, but the atmosphere adds to the flavor. Highly recommended to try out some Dutch cuisine.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Very delicious traditional Dutch food , we tried 3 type of meshed potatoes and mini pancakes , it was amazing taste and the owner is very welcoming and lovely person.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Waited 2 hours for our main course, dessert was brought before our main then eventually when our main arrived my 'suddervlees' was over cooked or dried out. Not a very pleasant experience tbh. All we were given is some cheap shot to take ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We want for dinner there. Great traditional mashed potatoes! Awesome staff who would sing along the background songs and find time to chat with you.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Great food, had dinner here twice during my short stay in Amsterdam. Totally coming back the next time I visit. Service was pleasant. Staff is friendly.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The staff was super nice to other customers but rude to us. The food was fair but my steak was tough! I'm sure that there would be better restaurants nearby.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Very nice plates with delicious taste. The place is a little tiny, but the courtesy is excellent. Good selection of beers.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Went in for something new, absolutely loved the food and the people of the restaurant. Great service and a great price. The owner is funny and attentive.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: First time in Amsterdam and the waiters/ bartender made you feel so welcomed and at home. The food was great and the place was so cute and comfortable.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Fantastic little place, amazing Dutch food. Didn't know what to expect but service with a style and loads of character! Definitely recommended

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Very friendly staff especially the ma√Ætresse d' who was a real hoot. Good good, portions generous we had sole and granny's beef stew and apple pie.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Nice place to taste typical dutch dishes.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Had a voucher from the hotel for a free soft drink or a liquor shot, though we were denied the free soft drink and had to pay. Understaffed and the food was not so great.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Stumbled in here while staying at the nearby Pulitzer hotel. A great cozy and authentic dinner, the owner herself waited on us. A lot of fun. Don‚Äôt miss the the Stampott trio

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The food was meh. Ok bar selection. Wait staff had no people skills. Did not take credit, cash only. If you sit outside, you go inside for service.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: It took like 45min to get our main courses by a somewhat rude staff... Then no credit card was allowed despite the MasterCard & Visa logo perfectly displayed at their door. Food quality way below average in the area. I wouldn't recommend this place...

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Fantastic traditional Dutch food served by super friendly staff in a lovely cosy intimate setting. You will not be disappointed.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Lovely little quirky & cozy. We come for an English breakfast on our way to visit Anne Frank's house. Staff really friendly and very helpful x

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Basic eatery not set up for larger groups as we were asked to limit our menus choices to 4 dishes so that they kitchen could accommodate us. Group of 7

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: You'll find all typically Dutch desserts and snacks here. There's an average terrace, nothing out of the ordinary. Except Johnny Jordaan, vanilla and strawberry ice cream. Worth a try!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere, delicious authentic food, friendly and funny staff. Would recommend for a quick, well-priced meal!

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Fantastic pancakes and location. Nice to sit by the canal and enjoy a bite to eat but the road can get busy and a little noisy at times with cars, the bikes aren't a problem.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: food were good but card pay was not available, so we paid by cash they have no change and we have to got the change somewhere else ourselves, first day in Amsterdam bad experience

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Delicious food, personable manager, sexy

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Food was OK but expensive and not special. Staff was rude. Also, didn't want to give us tap water even if we did order something else to drink.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Nice place. If you like Dutch food. Can fit you in quite quickly if not booked

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Great service, delicious food and a really welcome atmosphere!! Would definitely recommend.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Good local cuisine, lively atmosphere and nice personnel. Altogether a very nice experience; standard prices as for all city center venues üòÄ

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Excelent traditional restaurant with kind stuff, delicious food and desserts. Good prices. Good altmosphere.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Lovely cozy setting, friendly staff, local cuisine. Also returned the 10 euro we overpaid them! Thanks guys.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: very nice staff and traditional dutch food. Cozy and small, is what I would describe the restaurant.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Delicious Dutch food. Comfortable and friendly atmosphere. I would definitely recommend for a taste of the Netherlands

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Amazing time there. We had so much fun. Very good service and a pleasure to meet the owners !

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text:
Tried to call 20 times to book a table, no answer...
Sent an email to book a table as suggested, no answer...
Went there with best attitude... ‚Ä¶

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: The food was tasty but nothing special. Also we waited more than 20 minutes for our orders to be ready.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: nice plc

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Terrible service. Food was over cooked. Did not have appropriate card machine. Looked busy,  but looks can be deceiving.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Try the stamppot sampler. Its really good.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Hair in my food, didn't come with vegetables like it said it would, moms chicken salad didn't come with chicken like it said it would, service was AWFUL and unless you LOVE sauerkraut, don't get the stamppot.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Great traditional Dutch food at a reasonable price. If you're a tourist looking for a Dutch experience, this place ticks the boxes.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Very tasty food. Friendly staff. Love the old traditional   atmosphere! üòä

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: We ordered a medium cooked steak. It was raw. We sent it back for re-cooking.... it came back raw.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Cozy small restaurant with great food, very nice and friendly owner and staff. No credit card, so be sure have cash on you.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Good food, friendly staff. Nothing fancy, but really nice atmosphere.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text:
lovely little cafe

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Cozy, fantastic and a great lunch. Our waitress was a delight and helpful.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: I walked for 30 minutes to eat there. It was closed on Thursday, Jan 2, at 14:20, while Google maps says it should be open.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Carla is amazing... We had a very fun time in her pub.

Name: Bistro Bij Ons
Review Text: Great food. Great service. Will be back for more for sure!
